teams.name: Windhoek Wasps
teams.description: The Windhoek Wasps are known for their aggressive playing style and strong defensive tactics.

teams.name: Coastal Sharks
teams.description: Based in the coastal city of Swakopmund, the Sharks are famous for their fast-paced attacking style.

teams.name: Desert Eagles
teams.description: The Desert Eagles represent the spirit of Walvis Bay with their endurance and tactical gameplay.

teams.name: Northern Wolves
teams.description: Known for their pack mentality and team coordination, the Wolves are a force to be reckoned with.
